mapper.sql: SELECT a.ldun_rqst_mdfy_no /** N° rectification de demande de déchargement !== 하역신청정정번호 */ , a.ldun_rqst_mdfy_mgrn /** N° gestion de la rectification de demande de déchargement !== 양하신청정정관리번호 */ , a.ldun_rqst_no /** N° De Demande De Déchargement !== 하역신청번호 ==! */ , a.mrn /* Mrn !== MRN ==! */ , TO_CHAR(a.trsn_dttm ,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS trsn_dttm /** Date et heure de transmission !== 전송일시 ==! */ , a.trsn_dttm AS sort_trsn_dttm /** Date et heure de transmission !== 전송일시 ==! */ , a.cag_rqst_tp_cd /** Code de classement du suivi du fret !== 화물신청구분코드 ==! */ , a.jrsd_orgn_cd /** Code D'Unité Compétente !== 관할조직코드 ==! */ , FN_GET_ORGN_NM(a.jrsd_orgn_cd) AS jrsd_orgn_nm , cstm.jrsd_cstm_cd AS jrsd_cstm_cd /** Code de bureau compétent !== 관할세관코드 ==! */ , cstm.jrsd_cstm_nm AS jrsd_cstm_nm /** Code de bureau compétent !== 관할세관코드 ==! */ , a.trsn_co_cd /** Code d'entreprise transmettrice !== 전송업체코드 ==! */ , a.carr_cd /** Code De Société De Transport !== 운송사코드 ==! */ , cc.carr_nm , TO_CHAR(a.real_arvl_dttm ,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS real_arvl_dttm /** Date Et Heure D'Arrivée Effective !== 실제도착일시 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(a.ldun_expc_dttm,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS ldun_expc_dttm /** Date/Heure de déchargement prévue !== 하역예상일시 ==! */ , a.apre_yn_cd /** Autorisation O/N !== 승인여부코드 ==! */ , a.audt_opin_cn /** Contenu De L'Opinion é La Suite De La Vérification !== 심사의견내용 ==! */ , a.mdfy_dgcnt /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ , a.mdfy_rsn_cn /** Motif de rectification !== 정정사유내용 ==! */ , a.mdfy_atch_file_id /** ID de pièce jointe de rectification !== 정정첨부파일ID ==! */ , a.co_rqst_no /** N° de demande d'entreprise !== 업체신청번호 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(a.anch_dttm ,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS anch_dttm /** !== 정박일시 ==! */ , a.del_yn /** Suppression ON !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , a.frst_regst_id /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(a.frst_rgsr_dttm ,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS frst_rgsr_dttm /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , a.last_chpr_id /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(a.last_chg_dttm ,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS last_chg_dttm /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ , c.al_bl_gcnt AS bl_cnt , NVL(c.ldun_bl_gcnt, 0) AS ldun_bl_gcnt /** Nombre de BL déchargé !== 양하BL개수 ==! */ , c.al_cntr_gcnt AS al_cntr_gcnt /** Nombre Total De Conteneurs !== 전체컨테이너개수 ==! */ , c.al_vhcl_gcnt AS al_vhcl_gcnt /** Nombre Total De Véhicules !== 전체차량개수 ==! */ , c.trnp_meth_nm AS trnp_meth_nm /** Nom De Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단명 ==! */ , c.trnp_rfer_no AS trnp_rfer_no /** N° de référence de transport !== 운송참고번호 ==! */ , pb.prcs_stts_cd /** Code de statut de traitement !== 처리상태코드 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(pb.prcs_dttm, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS prcs_dttm /** Date de traitement !== 처리일자 ==! */ , pb.rqst_dgcnt /** N° ordre de la demande !== 신청차수 ==! */ , pb.hnot_emp_id /** ID du chargé de cotation !== 배부직원ID ==! */ , pb.audt_emp_id /** ID de l'insepcteur !== 심사직원ID ==! */ , (SELECT EMP.EMP_FMNM || ' ' || EMP.EMP_NM FROM TB_POTI_EMP EMP WHERE EMP.pbsr_no = pb.audt_emp_id) AS audt_emp_nm /** Nom de l'inspecteur !==심사직원명==! */ , pb.insc_emp_id AS insc_emp_id /** ID de l'vérificateur !== 검사직원ID ==! */ , hnot.bfch_emp_id AS bfch_emp_id /** Id De L'Inspecteur Avant La Modification !== 변경전직원ID ==! */ , hnot.bfch_emp_nm AS bfch_emp_nm /** Id De L'Inspecteur Avant La Modification !== 변경전직원ID ==! */ , hnot.afch_emp_id AS afch_emp_id /** Id De L'Inspecteur Après La Modification !== 변경후직원ID ==! */ , hnot.afch_emp_nm AS afch_emp_nm /** Id De L'Inspecteur Après La Modification !== 변경후직원ID ==! */ , hnot.chg_rsn_cn AS chg_rsn_cn /** Motif De La Modification !== 변경사유내용 ==! */ FROM tb_cari_ldun_mdfy a LEFT JOIN tb_cari_ldun b ON a.mrn = b.mrn AND b.apre_yn_cd = 'O' LEFT join tb_cari_cag_dcsh c ON a.mrn = c.mrn LEFT JOIN tb_cari_cag_prcs_brkd pb ON a.cag_rqst_tp_cd = pb.cag_rqst_tp_cd AND a.ldun_rqst_mdfy_no = pb.cag_rqst_no AND pb.del_yn = 'N' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.cag_rqst_no AS cag_rqst_no /** N° De Demande De Cargaison !== 화물신청번호 ==! */ , a.cag_rqst_tp_cd AS cag_rqst_tp_cd /** Code de classement du suivi du fret !== 화물신청구분코드 ==! */ , a.bfch_emp_id AS bfch_emp_id /** Id De L'Inspecteur Avant La Modification !== 변경전직원ID ==! */ , a.afch_emp_id AS afch_emp_id /** Id De L'Inspecteur Après La Modification !== 변경후직원ID ==! */ , a.chg_rsn_cn AS chg_rsn_cn /** Motif De La Modification !== 변경사유내용 ==! */ , e1.EMP_FMNM || ' ' || e1.emp_nm AS bfch_emp_nm /** Nom De L'Employé !== 직원명 ==! */ , e2.EMP_FMNM || ' ' || e2.emp_nm AS afch_emp_nm /** Nom De L'Employé !== 직원명 ==! */ FROM tb_cari_hnot_chg_h A INNER JOIN (SELECT cag_rqst_no , MAX(chg_hist_srno) chg_hist_srno FROM tb_cari_hnot_chg_h GROUP BY cag_rqst_no) h ON a.cag_rqst_no = h.cag_rqst_no AND a.chg_hist_srno = h.chg_hist_srno LEFT JOIN tb_poti_emp e1 ON e1.pbsr_no = a.bfch_emp_id LEFT JOIN tb_poti_emp e2 ON e2.pbsr_no = a.afch_emp_id) hnot ON hnot.cag_rqst_no = pb.cag_rqst_no AND hnot.cag_rqst_tp_cd = pb.cag_rqst_tp_cd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.co_nm carr_nm , t2.co_dclr_cd FROM tb_com_co t1 , tb_com_co_dclr_cd t2 WHERE t1.nif = t2.nif AND t2.del_yn = 'N') CC ON a.trsn_co_cd = cc.co_dclr_cd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c1.orgn_cd , c2.orgn_cd AS jrsd_cstm_cd , c2.orgn_nm AS jrsd_cstm_nm FROM tb_poti_orgn c1 LEFT JOIN tb_poti_orgn c2 ON c1.upr_orgn_mgmt_cd = c2.orgn_mgmt_cd WHERE c1.del_yn = 'N' ) cstm ON a.jrsd_orgn_cd = cstm.orgn_cd WHERE 1=1 AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND b.del_yn = 'N' AND c.del_yn = 'N' AND a.cag_rqst_tp_cd = #{cagRqstTpCd} /** Code de classement du suivi du fret !== 화물신청구분코드 ==! */ AND a.mdfy_dgcnt > 0

SELECT a.ldun_rqst_mdfy_no /** N° rectification de demande de déchargement !== 하역신청정정번호 ==! */ , a.ldun_rqst_mdfy_mgrn /** N° gestion de la rectification de demande de déchargement !== 양하신청정정관리번호==! */ , b.ldun_rqst_no /** N° De Rapport Sur Le Déchargement !== 하역신청번호 ==! */ , b.ldun_rqst_mgmt_no /** N° De Gestion De Demande De Déchargement !== 하역신청관리번호 ==! */ , c.cag_dcsh_rgsr_mgmt_no /** Numéro de gestion de l'enregistrement de la déclaration de fret !== 화물신고서등록관리번호 ==! */ , a.mrn /* Mrn !== MRN ==! */ , TO_CHAR(a.trsn_dttm ,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS trsn_dttm /** Date et heure de transmission !== 전송일시 ==! */ , a.trsn_dttm AS sort_trsn_dttm /** Date et heure de transmission !== 전송일시 ==! */ , a.cag_rqst_tp_cd /** Code de classement du suivi du fret !== 화물신청구분코드 ==! */ , a.jrsd_orgn_cd /** Code D'Unité Compétente !== 관할조직코드 ==! */ , FN_GET_ORGN_NM(a.jrsd_orgn_cd) AS jrsd_orgn_nm , cstm.jrsd_cstm_cd AS jrsd_cstm_cd /** Code de bureau compétent !== 관할세관코드 ==! */ , cstm.jrsd_cstm_nm AS jrsd_cstm_nm /** Code de bureau compétent !== 관할세관코드 ==! */ , a.trsn_co_cd /** Code d'entreprise transmettrice !== 전송업체코드 ==! */ , FN_CARI_GET_CO_NM(a.trsn_co_cd) AS trsn_co_nm , a.trsn_co_cd || ' | ' || FN_CARI_GET_CO_NM(a.trsn_co_cd) AS trsn_co_cd_nm , a.carr_cd /** Code De Société De Transport !== 운송사코드 ==! */ , FN_CARI_GET_CO_NM(a.carr_cd) AS carr_nm /** Code De Société De Transport !== 운송사코드 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(a.real_arvl_dttm ,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS real_arvl_dttm /** Date Et Heure D'Arrivée Effective !== 실제도착일시 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(a.ldun_expc_dttm,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS ldun_expc_dttm /** Date/Heure de déchargement prévue !== 하역예상일시 ==! */ , a.apre_yn_cd /** Autorisation O/N !== 승인여부코드 ==! */ , a.audt_opin_cn /** Contenu De L'Opinion é La Suite De La Vérification !== 심사의견내용 ==! */ , a.mdfy_dgcnt /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ , a.mdfy_rsn_cn /** Motif de rectification !== 정정사유내용 ==! */ , a.mdfy_atch_file_id /** ID de pièce jointe de rectification !== 정정첨부파일ID ==! */ , a.co_rqst_no /** N° de demande d'entreprise !== 업체신청번호 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(a.anch_dttm ,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS anch_dttm /** Date/Heure d'accostage !== 정박일시 ==! */ , a.trnp_meth_loct_nm /** Emplacement De Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단위치명 ==! */ , a.del_yn /** Suppression ON !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , a.frst_regst_id /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(a.frst_rgsr_dttm ,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS frst_rgsr_dttm /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , a.last_chpr_id /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(a.last_chg_dttm ,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS last_chg_dttm /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ , c.trnp_meth_nm /** Nom De Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단명 ==! */ , c.trnp_meth_idfy_no /** N° D'Identification Du Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단식별번호 ==! */ , c.trnp_rfer_no /** N° de référence de transport !== 운송참고번호 ==! */ , c.trnp_mean_cd /** Code de type de transport !==운송방법코드==! */ , brkd.prcs_stts_cd /** Code de statut de traitement !== 처리상태코드 ==! */ , brkd.hnot_emp_id /** ID de distributeur !==배부직원ID==! */ , brkd.audt_emp_id /** ID de la personne verifiant !==심사직원ID==! */ FROM tb_cari_ldun_mdfy a LEFT JOIN tb_cari_ldun b /**CARI_적하목록*/ ON a.mrn = b.mrn LEFT JOIN tb_cari_cag_dcsh c /**CARI_적하목록*/ ON a.mrn = c.mrn LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_cari_cag_prcs_brkd brkd ON a.ldun_rqst_mdfy_no = brkd.cag_rqst_no AND brkd.cag_rqst_tp_cd = a.cag_rqst_tp_cd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c1.orgn_cd , c2.orgn_cd AS jrsd_cstm_cd , c2.orgn_nm AS jrsd_cstm_nm FROM tb_poti_orgn c1 LEFT JOIN tb_poti_orgn c2 ON c1.upr_orgn_mgmt_cd = c2.orgn_mgmt_cd WHERE c1.del_yn = 'N' ) cstm ON a.jrsd_orgn_cd = cstm.orgn_cd WHERE 1=1 AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND b.del_yn = 'N' AND c.del_yn = 'N'
mapper.select:
/* CarCagLdunRqstMdfyMapper.selectCarCagLdunRqstMdfyList */
AND pb.audt_emp_id = #{audtEmpId} /** ID de la personne vérifiant != 심사직원ID =! */
AND a.trsn_dttm >= TO_DATE(#{trsnDttmFrom},'DD/MM/YYYY')
AND a.trsn_dttm < TO_DATE(#{trsnDttmTo},'DD/MM/YYYY')+1
AND pb.prcs_dttm >= TO_DATE(#{prcsDttmFrom},'DD/MM/YYYY')
AND pb.prcs_dttm < TO_DATE(#{prcsDttmTo},'DD/MM/YYYY')+1
AND a.JRSD_ORGN_CD IN (
SELECT unnest(string_to_array(alpassint.fn_cari_get_orgcd('O', #{jrsdOrgnCd}), ','))
SELECT unnest(string_to_array(alpassint.fn_cari_get_orgcd('P', #{frstRegstId}), ','))
)
/** Code de statut de traitement !== 처리상태코드 ==! */ AND pb.prcs_stts_cd IN
#{item}
AND a.ldun_rqst_mdfy_no = #{ldunRqstMdfyNo} /** N° De Demande De Déchargement !== 하역신청번호 ==! */
AND UPPER(a.mrn) LIKE UPPER(#{mrn})||'%' /** MRN !== MRN ==! */
AND UPPER(cc.carr_nm) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{carrNm})||'%' /** Code de société de transport !== 운송사코드 ==! */
AND UPPER(c.trnp_meth_nm) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{trnpMethNm})||'%' /** Nom de moyen de transport !== 운송수단명 ==! */
AND UPPER(c.trnp_rfer_no) LIKE UPPER(#{trnpRferNo})||'%' /** N° de voyage/N° de vol/N° d'itinéraire !== 운송참고번호 ==! */
AND UPPER(c.trnp_meth_idfy_no) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{trnpMethIdfyNo})||'%' /** N° D'Identification Du Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단식별번호 ==! */
AND c.trnp_mean_cd = #{trnpMeanCd} /** Code de mode de transport !== 운송방법코드 ==! */
ORDER BY sort_trsn_dttm DESC /** Date et heure de transmission !== 전송일시 ==! */

/* CarCagLdunRqstMdfyMapper.selectCarCagLdunRqstMdfyBeforeItem */ SELECT tbl.* FROM (
AND a.mrn = #{mrn} AND a.mdfy_dgcnt = NVL((SELECT MAX(a.mdfy_dgcnt) FROM tb_cari_ldun_mdfy a, tb_cari_cag_prcs_brkd b WHERE 1=1 AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND b.del_yn = 'N' AND a.ldun_rqst_mdfy_no = b.cag_rqst_no AND a.cag_rqst_tp_cd = b.cag_rqst_tp_cd AND a.mrn = #{mrn} AND a.mdfy_dgcnt < #{mdfyDgcnt} AND b.prcs_stts_cd = 'D08'),0) ORDER BY a.mdfy_dgcnt DESC ) tbl WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: /* CarCagLdunRqstMdfyMapper.updateCarCagLdunRqstMdfy */ UPDATE tb_cari_ldun_mdfy SET del_yn = 'N' /** Suppression ON !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , last_chpr_id = #{lastChprId} /** ID du modificateur final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , last_chg_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP /** Date et heure de modification finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ , apre_yn_cd = #{apreYnCd} /** Autorisation O/N !== 승인여부코드 ==! */ , audt_opin_cn = #{audtOpinCn} /** Contenu De L'Opinion À La Suite De La Vérification !== 심사의견내용 ==! */ WHERE 1=1 AND ldun_rqst_mdfy_no = #{ldunRqstMdfyNo} /** N° De Demande De Déchargement !== 하역신청번호 ==! */

/* CarCagLdunRqstMdfyMapper.updateCareCagLdunRqstMdfy */ UPDATE alpassext.tb_care_ldun_mdfy SET LAST_CHPR_ID = #{lastChprId} /** Identifiant du modificateur final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , LAST_CHG_DTTM = SYSTIMESTAMP /** Date et heure de modification finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ , PRCS_DTTM = TO_DATE(#{prcsDttm},'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') /** Date et heure de traitement !== 처리일시 ==! */ , PRCS_STTS_CD = #{prcsSttsCd} /** Code de statut de traitement !== 처리상태코드 ==! */ , INFM_CN = #{infmCn} /** Contenu De Notification !== 통보내용 ==! */ WHERE ldun_rqst_mdfy_mgrn = #{ldunRqstMdfyMgrn} /** N° De Gestion De Demande De Déchargement !== 하역신청정정관리번호 ==! */
